verses.roman:
abhakta-uṣṭrera ithe nā haya praveśa
tabe citte haya mora ānanda-viśeṣa

synonyms: abhakta—nondevotee; uṣṭrera—of a camel; ithe—in this; nā—not; haya—is there; praveśa—entrance; tabe—then; citte—in my heart; haya—there is; mora—my; ānanda-viśeṣa—special jubilation.
translation: The camellike nondevotees cannot enter into these topics. Therefore there is special jubilation in my heart.
